mapper.select: SELECT area_id, area_name, area_priority, create_time, last_edit_time, area_enable_status FROM tb_area WHERE area_enable_status=1 ORDER BY area_priority DESC

SELECT area_id, area_name, area_priority, create_time, last_edit_time, area_enable_status FROM tb_area WHERE operator_id=#{areaCondition.operator.operatorId} AND area_enable_status=1 ORDER BY area_priority DESC
SELECT area_id, area_name, area_priority, create_time, last_edit_time, area_enable_status FROM tb_area ORDER BY area_priority DESC LIMIT #{rowIndex},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_area ( area_name, area_priority, create_time, last_edit_time, operator_id, area_enable_status ) VALUES ( #{areaName}, #{areaPriority}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime}, #{operator.operatorId}, #{areaEnableStatus} )
